title: WATT Platform - Energy Market Prediction
description: Master's thesis project developing predictive models for day-ahead and intraday energy market analysis. Built contract-decision engine and production data pipeline with MLOps practices.

title: Atlas Investor
description: Geospatial real estate investment platform for analyzing, ranking, and optimizing property deals across Portugal using ROI, rental yield, zoning data, and development feasibility metrics.

title: Travel Planner
description: Plan trips with maps, POIs, and weather integration. Python web application with CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment.

title: PopcornGuess
description: Fast daily challenge about streaming culture. Players solve clues from frames, audio, and quotes to guess movies, series, creators, and characters.

title: PhotoPack
description: Marketplace for photographers to sell watermarked photo packs, with online payments and automatic high-res delivery by email.
